titleStmt.title: A treatise of Gods effectual calling: written first in the Latine tongue, by the reuerend and faithfull seruant of Christ, Maister Robert Rollock, preacher of Gods word in Edenburgh. And now faithfully translated for the benefite of the vnlearned, into the English tongue, by Henry Holland, preacher in London
Tractatus de vocatione efficaci, quae inter locos theologiæ communissimos recensetur, deque locis specialioribus, qui sub vocatione comprehenduntur. English
titleStmt.author: Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599.
Holland, Henry, 1555 or 6-1603.
Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Tractatus de vocatione efficaci, quae inter locos theologiæ communissimos recensetur, deque locis specialioribus, qui sub vocatione comprehenduntur.
Includes a letter from Théodore de Bèze to John Johnston.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
